font.div: - It has title Poke the Dots
- It has a black background
- It has aspect ratio 5:4

switch.text: - It has title Poke the Dots...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 338px; height: 1px; padding-top: 286px; margin-left: 32px;

font.div: - It is blue
- It moves twice as fast in the horizontal direction as the
vertical direction

div.div: - It starts in a random location
- It starts moving down and to the right
- It moves in a straight line
- It bounces off the window edges

switch.text: - It starts in a random location...

font.div: - It indicates the time since the game started
- It starts at 0
- It is in the top left corner of the window
- It uses large font size
- It is white on black

switch.text: - It indicates the time since the game started...

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #FFFFFF; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

font.div: - If the dots have not collide
- The dots teleport to random locations
- The dot speeds remain the same
- The dot trajectories remain the same

switch.text: - If the dots have not collide...

font.div: - The dots stop moving
- The score stops incrementing
- The game displays a game over message

font.div: - It is in the bottom left corner of the window
- It uses large font size
- It uses small dot colour on big dot colour

switch.text: - It is in the bottom left corner of the window...

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
